content: After the fight, take the path that slopes down behind the area where you fought the Flint Vanguard. You'll encounter some more of the Searing and Scorching-Flame enemies, as well as a little green Wisp to the right, by the lava lake.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
After the fight, take the path that slopes down behind the area where you fought the Flint Vanguard. You'll encounter some more of the Searing and Scorching-Flame enemies, as well as a little green Wisp to the right, by the lava lake.
